mapper.select: SELECT ac.id as appCateId,ac.`name` as appCateName FROM app_cate ac WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY ac.sort asc

SELECT ai.id AS appId, ai.code as appCode, ai.NAME AS appName FROM dealer_app_info dai, app_info ai WHERE dai.ai_id = ai.id AND dai.STATUS = 1 AND ai.STATUS = 1 AND ai.del_flag = 0 AND dai.dealer_id = #{dealerId}
and ai.name like CONCAT('%',#{queryName},'%')

SELECT ai.id AS appId, ai.CODE AS appCode, ai.NAME AS appName, dapi.price as appPrice, dapi.id as priceId FROM dealer_app_price_info dapi LEFT JOIN dealer_app_info dai ON ( dapi.ai_id = dai.ai_id AND dai.`status` = 1 ) LEFT JOIN app_info ai ON ( ai.id = dapi.ai_id AND ai.`status` = 1 ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND dai.STATUS = 1 AND ai.STATUS = 1 AND ai.del_flag = 0 AND dai.dealer_id = #{dealerId} AND dapi.`status` = 1
AND ai.name like CONCAT('%',#{queryName},'%')
SELECT name from app_info where id = #{goId}
SELECT name from app_cate where id = #{goId}
select price from dealer_app_price_info where id = #{goId}
select a.name from app_info a inner join (select ai_id from dealer_app_price_info where id = #{goId}) b on a.id=b.ai_id
